ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would summarize this class as a course for seriously analyzing one's own approach to teaching; I would recommend it to anyone considering teaching at all, as it provides an expanded perception of what teaching aims at as well as materials to reach those goals.

I would absolutely recommend Physics 530 for any students who are interested in teaching after and/or during graduate school. This class gives you a great toolkit from which to become a more confident and more effective teacher.
It's a good class to introduce someone to scientific teaching and also opens the doors to network with a community of scholars in education.

It is a great course if you are interested in pursuing a teaching career in the hard sciences. It provides a good foundation that will help one understand the current environment of the field. I imagine the education would make applying to teaching positions, particularly writing a teaching statement, more effective.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course allowed me to critically think about teaching, its goal, and its implementation; as a student, this correspondingly helped me analyze my own methods for learning and reaching my research/learning objectives.

This course really helped me improve my teaching skills and become more cognizant of everything I do in the classroom as a teacher. This course was absolutely crucial in helping me develop skills I will need for becoming a great teacher.

It provided an interesting perspective of how to improve teaching. While the course is not related to my researchat all, it has motivated me to explore teaching more seriously as an alternate career option.
